00018 template<
00019   class CHAR_T = char
00020   >
00021 class is_alphabet
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   static bool value(CHAR_T c)
00025   {
00026     return c>='a' && c<='z'||c>='A' && c<= 'Z';
00027   }
00028 
00029   static bool is_upper(CHAR_T c)
00030   {
00031     return c>='A' && c<= 'Z';
00032   }
00033 
00034   static bool is_lower(CHAR_T c)
00035   {
00036     return c>='a' && c<='z';
00037   }
00038 
00039   static CHAR_T to_lower(CHAR_T c)
00040   {
00041     if (is_upper(c))
00042       return c - ('A'-'a');
00043 
00044     return c;    
00045   }
00046 
00047   static CHAR_T to_upper(CHAR_T c)
00048   {
00049     if (is_lower(c))
00050       return c + ('A'-'a');
00051     return c;
00052   }
00053 
00054   static bool equal_ignore_case(CHAR_T c1, CHAR_T c2)
00055   {
00056     return c1==c2 || c1-c2=='A'-'a' || c1 - c2=='a'-'A';
00057   }
00058 
00059   static bool is_space(CHAR_T c)
00060   {
00061     return c == ' ';
00062   }
00063 
00064   static bool is_new_line(CHAR_T c)
00065   {
00066     return (c == '\n');
00067   }
00068   
00069 
00070 }
00071   ;

00074 template<
00075   class CHAR_T = char
00076   >
00077 class is_numeric
00078 {
00079 public:
00080   static bool value(CHAR_T c)
00081   {
00082     return c>='0' && c<='9';
00083   }
00084 
00085   static bool is_positive(CHAR_T c)
00086   {
00087     return c=='+';
00088   }
00089 
00090   static bool is_negative(CHAR_T c)
00091   {
00092     return c=='-';
00093   }
00094   
00095   static CHAR_T  numeric_value(CHAR_T c)
00096   {
00097     if (!value(c))
00098       return 0;
00099     
00100     return c- '0';
00101   }
00102 
00103   static bool is_dot(CHAR_T c)
00104   {
00105     return c == '.';
00106   }
00107 
00108   static CHAR_T dot()
00109   {
00110     return '.';
00111   }
00112   
00113 }
00114   ;

00127 template <
00128   class StringT = std::string,
00129   class IS_NUMERIC = is_numeric<typename StringT::value_type>,
00130   class IS_ALPHABET = is_alphabet<typename StringT::value_type>
00131   >
00132 class Algorithm
00133 {
00134   typedef typename StringT::value_type CharT;
00135   typedef typename StringT::size_t size_t;
00136   
00137 public:
00138   enum StrCompMode { SM_SENSITIVE, SM_IGNORE };
00139   
00140   //*******************KMP**********************
00141   static void get_nextval(const StringT& s, uint64_t next[], StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE)
00142   {
00143     // 求模式串T的next函数值并存入数组 next。
00144     uint64_t j = 0, k = -1;
00145 
00146     next[0] = -1;
00147 
00148     while ( j < s.length()-1 )
00149     {
00150       if (k == (uint64_t)-1 
00151           || caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]== s[k]
00152          || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00153       {
00154         ++j; ++k;
00155 
00156         if (caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]!= s[k]
00157             ||caseChk==SM_IGNORE && !IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00158           next[j] = k;
00159         else
00160           next[j] = next[k];
00161       }// if
00162       else
00163         k = next[k];
00164     }// while
00165   }// get_nextval　
00166 
00171   static uint64_t KMP(const StringT& text,const StringT& pattern, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE) //const 表示函数内部不会改变这个参数的值。
00172   {
00173 
00174     if( text.length()==0 || pattern.length()==0 )//
00175       return -1;//空指针或空串，返回-1。
00176 
00177     uint64_t len= pattern.length();
00178 
00179     uint64_t *next= (uint64_t*)hlmalloc((len+1)*sizeof (uint64_t));
00180 
00181     get_nextval(pattern,next, caseChk);//求Pattern的next函数值
00182 
00183     uint64_t index=0,i=0,j=0;
00184 
00185     while(i < text.length() && j < pattern.length())
00186     {
00187       if(caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && text[i]== pattern[j]
00188          || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(text[i], pattern[j]) )
00189       {
00190         ++i;// 继续比较后继字符
00191         ++j;
00192 
00193       }
00194       else
00195       {
00196         index += j-next[j];
00197 
00198         if(next[j]!=(uint64_t)-1)
00199 
00200           j=next[j];// 模式串向右移动
00201         else
00202         {
00203           j=0;
00204           ++i;
00205         }
00206       }
00207     }//while
00208 
00209     hlfree(next);
00210 
00211     if(j == pattern.length())
00212       return index;// 匹配成功
00213     else
00214       return -1;      
00215 
00216   }
00217 
00218   //*******************rKMP**********************  
00219   static void rget_nextval(const StringT& s, uint64_t next[], StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE)
00220   {
00221     // 求模式串T的next函数值并存入数组 next。
00222 
00223     uint64_t j = s.length()-1, k = s.length();
00224 
00225     next[s.length()] = s.length();
00226 
00227     while ( j >0 )
00228     {
00229       if (k == s.length()
00230           || caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]== s[k]
00231           || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00232       {
00233         --j; --k;
00234 
00235         if (caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && s[j]!= s[k]
00236             ||caseChk==SM_IGNORE && !IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(s[j], s[k]) )
00237           next[j+1] = k;
00238         else
00239           next[j+1] = next[k+1];
00240 
00241       }// if
00242       else
00243         k = next[k+1];
00244 
00245     }// while
00246 
00247   }// get_nextval　
00248 
00254   static uint64_t rKMP(const StringT& text,const StringT& pattern, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE) //const 表示函数内部不会改变这个参数的值。
00255   {
00256 
00257     if( text.length()==0 || pattern.length()==0 )//
00258       return -1;//空指针或空串，返回-1。
00259 
00260     uint64_t len= pattern.length();
00261 
00262     uint64_t *next= (uint64_t*)hlmalloc((len+1)*sizeof (uint64_t));
00263 
00264     rget_nextval(pattern,next, caseChk);//求Pattern的next函数值
00265     
00266     uint64_t index=text.length()-1,i=text.length()-1,j=pattern.length()-1;
00267 
00268     while(i !=(uint64_t)-1  && j !=(uint64_t)-1 )
00269     {
00270       if(caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && text[i]== pattern[j]
00271          || caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(text[i], pattern[j]) )
00272       {
00273         --i;// 继续比较后继字符
00274         --j;
00275       }
00276       else
00277       {
00278         index -= next[j+1] - j;
00279         
00280         if(next[j+1]!= pattern.length())
00281           j=next[j+1];// 模式串向右移动
00282         else
00283         {
00284           j=pattern.length()-1;
00285           --i;
00286         }
00287       }
00288 
00289     }//while
00290 
00291     hlfree(next);
00292 
00293     if(j == (uint64_t)-1)
00294       return index;// 匹配成功
00295     else
00296       return -1;
00297   }

00300   
00301   static int to_integer(const StringT& str) 
00302   {
00303     int r = 0;
00304     int k=1;
00305     
00306     for (typename StringT::const_reverse_iterator i= str.rbegin(); i!=str.rend();i++, k *= 10)
00307     {
00308       if (!IS_NUMERIC::value(*i))
00309       {
00310         assert(IS_NUMERIC::is_positive( *i) || IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i));
00311         
00312         if (IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i))
00313           return -1*r;
00314         return r;
00315       }
00316       
00317       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(*i)*k;
00318     }
00319     
00320     return r;
00321   }
00322   
00323   static long to_long(const StringT& str) 
00324   {
00325     long r=0;
00326     long k =1;
00327 
00328         
00329     for (typename StringT::const_reverse_iterator i= str.rbegin(); i!=str.rend();i++, k *= 10)
00330     {
00331       if (!IS_NUMERIC::value(*i))
00332       {
00333         assert(IS_NUMERIC::is_positive( *i) || IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i));
00334         if (IS_NUMERIC::is_negative( *i))
00335           return -1*r;
00336         return r;
00337       }
00338       
00339       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(*i)*k;
00340     }
00341 
00342     return r;
00343   }
00344   
00345   static unsigned long to_ulong(const StringT& str) 
00346   {
00347     unsigned  long r=0;
00348     unsigned long k =1;
00349 
00350         
00351     for (typename StringT::const_reverse_iterator i= str.rbegin(); i!=str.rend();i++, k *= 10)
00352     {
00353       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(*i)*k;
00354     }
00355 
00356     return r;
00357   }
00358   
00359   static float to_float(const StringT& str) 
00360   {
00361     float r = 0;
00362     float k = 1;
00363     
00364     size_t dot = str.find(IS_NUMERIC::dot());
00365     if (dot == StringT::npos)
00366       dot = str.length();
00367 
00368     size_t i=dot-1;
00369     for (; i!=(size_t)-1 && IS_NUMERIC::value(str[i]); i--, k *=10)
00370       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(str[i])*k;
00371 
00372     
00373     float o = 1;
00374     if (i!=(size_t)-1 && IS_NUMERIC::is_negative(str[i]))
00375       o = -1;
00376 
00377     k = 10.;
00378     for (i = dot+1; i<str.length() && str[i]>='0'&& str[i]<='9'; i++, k *=10)
00379       r += IS_NUMERIC::numeric_value(str[i])/k;
00380     
00381     r *= o;
00382 
00383     return r;
00384   }

00387   {
00388     for (typename StringT::iterator i=str.begin(); i!=str.end();i++)
00389     {
00390       *i = IS_ALPHABET::to_lower(*i);
00391     }
00392   }

00435 
00436   static bool equal_ignore_case (const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2)
00437   {
00438     if (str1.length()!=str2.length())
00439       return false;
00440 
00441     typename StringT::const_iterator j=str2.begin();
00442 
00443     for (typename StringT::const_iterator i=str1.begin(); i!=str1.end()&&j!=str2.end();i++, j++)
00444     {
00445       if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(*i, *j))
00446         return false;
00447     }
00448 
00449     return true;
00450   }
00451 
00455   static bool equal_ignore_case_space(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2)
00456   {
00457     typename StringT::const_iterator j=str2.begin();
00458     typename StringT::const_iterator i=str1.begin();
00459 
00460     for (; i!=str1.end()&&j!=str2.end();i++,j++)
00461     {
00462       while (i!=str1.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*i))
00463         i++;
00464 
00465       while (j!=str2.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*j))
00466         j++;
00467 
00468       if (i==str1.end() || j==str2.end())\
00469         break;
00470       
00471       if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(*i, *j))
00472         return false;
00473     }
00474 
00475     while (i!=str1.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*i))
00476       i++;
00477 
00478     if (i!= str1.end())
00479       return false;
00480     
00481     while (j!=str2.end() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(*j))
00482         j++;
00483     if (j!= str2.end())
00484       return false;
00485 
00486     return true;
00487   }
00488 
00489   static size_t find(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00490   {
00491     if (str2.length()>str1.length()-pos1)
00492         return -1;
00493 
00494     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00495       return str1.find(str2, pos1);
00496     else
00497     {
00498       size_t i = KMP(str1.substr(pos1), str2, caseChk);
00499       if (i == (size_t)-1)
00500         return -1;
00501       return pos1 + i;
00502     }
00503   }
00504 
00505   static size_t rfind(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = StringT::npos, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00506   {
00507     if (pos1 == StringT::npos &&  str2.length()>str1.length())
00508         return -1;
00509     if (pos1 != StringT::npos && str2.length()>pos1+1)
00510         return -1;
00511 
00512     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00513       return str1.rfind(str2, pos1);
00514     else
00515     {
00516       return rKMP(str1.substr(0, (pos1 == StringT::npos? pos1: pos1+1)), str2, caseChk);
00517     }
00518   }
00519 
00526   static size_t multi_find(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, std::vector<size_t>& indices,
00527                  size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00528   {
00529     indices.clear();
00530 
00531     size_t i = pos1;
00532 
00533     while (i!= (size_t)-1)
00534     {
00535       i = find(str1, str2, i, caseChk);
00536       if (i!= (size_t)-1)
00537       {
00538         indices.push_back(i);
00539         i += str2.length();
00540       }
00541       
00542     }
00543 
00544     return indices.size();
00545   }

00551   static bool start_with(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00552   {
00553     if (str2.length()>str1.length()-pos1)
00554         return false;
00555     
00556     size_t i = pos1;
00557     size_t j = 0;
00558       
00559     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00560     {
00561       for (; j<str2.length();i++, j++)
00562       {
00563         if (str1[i] != str2[j])
00564           return false;
00565       }
00566     }
00567     else
00568     {
00569       for (; j<str2.length();i++, j++)
00570       {
00571         if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str1[i], str2[j]))
00572           return false;
00573       }
00574     }
00575 
00576     return true;
00577   }
00578 
00579   
00580   static bool end_with(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2, size_t pos1 = StringT::npos, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00581   {
00582     if (pos1 == StringT::npos)
00583       pos1 = str1.length()-1;
00584     
00585     if (str2.length()>pos1+1)
00586         return false;
00587     
00588     size_t i = pos1;
00589     size_t j = str2.length()-1;
00590       
00591     if (SM_SENSITIVE == caseChk)
00592     {
00593       for (; j!=(size_t)-1; i--, j--)
00594       {
00595         if (str1[i] != str2[j])
00596           return false;
00597       }
00598     }
00599     else
00600     {
00601       for (; j !=(size_t) -1;i--, j--)
00602       {
00603         if (!IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str1[i], str2[j]))
00604           return false;
00605       }
00606     }
00607 
00608     return true;
00609   }

00617   static size_t num_occurrence(const StringT& str1, const StringT& str2,
00618                                 size_t pos1 = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00619   {
00620     size_t r =0;
00621     size_t i = pos1;
00622     
00623     while (i!= (size_t)-1)
00624     {
00625       i = find(str1, str2, i, caseChk);
00626       if (i!= (size_t)-1)
00627       {
00628         i += str2.length();
00629         r ++;
00630       }
00631       
00632     }
00633 
00634     return r;
00635   }

00642   static void frequency_counter(const StringT& str, const std::vector<StringT>& patterns, std::vector<size_t>& freq,
00643                                 StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00644   {
00645     freq.clear();
00646     freq.reserve(patterns.size());
00647     
00648     for (typename std::vector<StringT>::const_iterator i=patterns.begin(); i!= patterns.end();i++)
00649     {
00650       freq.push_back(num_occurrence(str, *i, 0, caseChk));
00651     }
00652   }

00657   static size_t  substitute_char(CharT from, CharT to, StringT& str, size_t pos = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00658   {
00659     size_t r = 0;
00660     for (size_t i=pos; i<str.length(); i++)
00661       if (caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i], from)
00662           ||caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==from)
00663       {
00664         r++;
00665         str[i] = to;
00666       }
00667     return r;
00668   }
00669 
00670   
00671   static StringT  substitute_char(CharT from, CharT to, const StringT& str, size_t pos = 0, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00672   {
00673     StringT s = str;
00674     size_t r = 0;
00675     for (size_t i=pos; i<str.length(); i++)
00676       if (caseChk==SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i], from)
00677           ||caseChk==SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==from)
00678       {
00679         r++;
00680         s[i] = to;
00681       }
00682     return r;
00683   }

00694   static size_t  multi_substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00695                                    StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00696                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00697   {
00698     std::vector<size_t> v;
00699     multi_find(str, from, v, pos, caseChk);
00700     
00701     StringT s;
00702 
00703     size_t last = 0;
00704     for (typename std::vector<size_t>::iterator i=v.begin(); i!=v.end(); i++)
00705     {
00706       assert(last<str.length());
00707       //std::cout<<str.substr(last, *i-last)<<last<<" "<<*i-last<<"\n";
00708       StringT ssss = str.substr(last, *i-last);
00709       //std::cout<<"jjjjjjjjjjjjj\n";
00710       s += ssss;
00711       s += to;
00712       last = *i+from.length();
00713     }
00714     
00715     s += str.substr(last);
00716     str = s;
00717     
00718     return v.size();
00719   }
00720 
00721   static StringT  multi_substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00722                                    const StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00723                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00724   {
00725     std::vector<size_t> v;
00726     multi_find(str, from, v, pos, caseChk);
00727     StringT s;
00728 
00729     size_t last = 0;
00730     for (typename std::vector<size_t>::iterator i=v.begin(); i!=v.end(); i++)
00731     {
00732       assert(last<str.length());
00733       s += str.substr(last, *i-last);
00734       s += to;
00735       last = *i+from.length();
00736     }
00737 
00738     s += str.substr(last);
00739     return s;
00740   }
00741 
00752   static StringT  substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00753                                    const StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00754                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00755   {
00756     StringT s = str;
00757     substitute_string(from, to, s, pos, caseChk);
00758     return s;
00759     
00760   }
00761 
00762   static void substitute_string(const StringT& from, const StringT& to,
00763                                    StringT& str, size_t pos = 0,
00764                                    StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE)
00765   {
00766     size_t i = find(str, from, pos, caseChk);
00767     StringT s;
00768     if (i == (size_t)-1)
00769       return;
00770 
00771     s += str.substr(0, i);
00772     s += to;
00773     i += from.length();
00774     if (i<str.length())
00775       s += str.substr(i);
00776 
00777     str = s;
00778   }
00779 
00780   static size_t remove_newlines(StringT& str)
00781   {
00782     size_t r = 0;
00783     for (size_t i=0; i<str.length(); i++)
00784       if (IS_ALPHABET::is_new_line(str[i]))
00785       {
00786         r++;
00787         str[i] = ' ';
00788       }
00789     
00790     return r;
00791   }
00792 
00793   
00794   static StringT remove_newlines(const StringT& str)
00795   {
00796     StringT r = str;
00797     remove_newlines(r);
00798     return r;
00799   }

00809   static void remove_duplicate_chars(StringT& str, CharT c)
00810   {
00811     StringT s;
00812     s.reserve(str.length());
00813     
00814     typename StringT::iterator i;
00815     int count = 0;
00816     
00817     for (i = str.begin(); i < str.end(); i++)
00818     {
00819       if (*i == c)
00820       {
00821         if (count > 0);
00822         else s += c;
00823         count++;
00824       }
00825       else {
00826         s += *i;
00827         count = 0;
00828       }
00829     }
00830 
00831     //std::cout<<s.getReferCnt()<<std::endl;
00832     str = s;
00833     //std::cout<<s.getReferCnt()<<std::endl;
00834   }
00835 
00836   static StringT remove_duplicate_chars(const StringT& str, CharT c)
00837   {
00838     StringT s = str;
00839     remove_duplicate_chars(s, c);
00840     return s;
00841     
00842   }
00843 
00844   static void remove_multi_whitespace(StringT& str)
00845   {
00846     remove_duplicate_chars(str, ' ');
00847   }
00848 
00849   static StringT remove_multi_whitespace(const StringT& str)
00850   {
00851     return remove_duplicate_chars(str, ' ');
00852   }
00853 
00859   static void make_tokens_with_delimiter(const StringT& str, const StringT& delimiter, std::vector<StringT>& tokens)
00860   {
00861     tokens.clear();
00862     
00863     if (str.length()<=delimiter.length())
00864       return;
00865 
00866     std::vector<size_t> indices;
00867     multi_find(str, delimiter, indices, 0, SM_SENSITIVE);
00868     tokens.reserve(indices.size()+1);
00869     indices.push_back(-1);
00870     
00871     size_t i = indices[0];
00872     if (i!=0)
00873       tokens.push_back(str.substr(0, i));
00874 
00875     for (; i<indices.size()-2;i++)
00876     {
00877       if (indices[i]+delimiter.length()>=indices[i+1])
00878         continue;
00879       tokens.push_back(str.substr(indices[i]+delimiter.length(),
00880                                   indices[i+1]==(size_t)-1? indices[i+1]: indices[i+1]-(indices[i]+delimiter.length())));
00881     }    
00882   }
00883 
00884   static StringT cut_range(const StringT& str, size_t start, size_t end) 
00885   {
00886     return str.substr(start, end - start + 1);
00887   }
00888 
00889   static void cut_range(StringT& str, size_t start, size_t end) 
00890   {
00891     str = str.substr(start, end - start + 1);
00892   }
00893 
00902   static StringT cut_delimiter(const StringT& str, size_t start, CharT delimiter) 
00903   {
00904     StringT s =str;
00905     cut_delimiter(s, start, delimiter);
00906     return s;
00907   }
00908 
00909   static void cut_delimiter(StringT& str, size_t start, CharT delimiter) 
00910   {
00911     assert(start < str.length());
00912     
00913     size_t i=start;
00914     
00915     while(str[i]!= delimiter)
00916     {
00917       i++;
00918       if (start + i >= str.length())
00919       {
00920         str.clear();
00921         return;
00922       }
00923     }
00924 
00925     if (i==start){
00926       str.clear();
00927       return ;
00928     }
00929     
00930     
00931     return cut_range(str, start, i-1);
00932   }
00933 
00934 
00943   static StringT cut_between_words(const StringT& str, const StringT& p1,
00944                                    const StringT& p2, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE) 
00945   {
00946     StringT s = str;
00947     cut_between_words(s, p1, p2, caseChk);
00948     return s;
00949   }
00950 
00951   static void cut_between_words(StringT& str, const StringT& p1,
00952                                 const StringT& p2, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_SENSITIVE ) 
00953   {
00954     size_t i = find(str, p1, 0, caseChk);
00955     if (i==(size_t)-1)
00956     {
00957       str.clear();
00958       return;
00959     }
00960     
00961     size_t j = rfind(str, p2, StringT::npos, caseChk);
00962     if (j==(size_t)-1)
00963     {
00964       str.clear();
00965       return ;
00966     }
00967     
00968     if (i+p1.length()>=j)
00969     {
00970       str.clear();
00971       return ;
00972     }
00973     
00974     str = str.substr(i+p1.length(), j-i-p1.length()-1);
00975   }
00976 
00977   static StringT cut_word_after(const StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00978   {
00979     StringT s = str;
00980     cut_word_after(s, tag, caseChk);
00981     return s;
00982   }
00983 
00984   static void cut_word_after(StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
00985   {
00986     size_t index = find(str, tag,0, caseChk);
00987     if (index!=(size_t)-1)
00988     {
00989       size_t i = index + tag.length();
00990       for (; i < str.length() && IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]); i++);
00991       
00992       if (i == str.length())
00993       {
00994         str.clear();
00995         return ;
00996       }
00997       
00998       
00999       size_t start = i;
01000       for (; i < str.length() && !IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]); i++);
01001       
01002       cut_range(str, start, i - 1);
01003       return;
01004     }
01005     
01006     str.clear();
01007   }
01008 
01009   static StringT cut_line_after(const StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
01010   {
01011     StringT s = str;
01012     cut_line_after(s, tag, caseChk);
01013     return s;
01014   }
01015 
01016   static void cut_line_after(StringT& str, const StringT& tag, StrCompMode caseChk=SM_IGNORE) 
01017   {
01018     size_t index = find(str, tag, 0, caseChk);
01019     if (index!=(size_t)-1)
01020     {
01021       size_t i = index + tag.length();
01022       if (i == str.length())
01023       {
01024         str.clear();
01025         return;
01026       }
01027 
01028       size_t start = i;
01029       for (; i < str.length() && !IS_ALPHABET::is_new_line(str[i]); i++);
01030       
01031       cut_range(str, start, i - 1);
01032       return;
01033     }
01034     
01035     str.clear();
01036   }
01037 
01045   static void take_between_marks(const StringT& str, CharT beg, CharT end,
01046                           std::vector<StringT>& arrayOfstrings) 
01047   {
01048     arrayOfstrings.clear();
01049     
01050     if (beg == end)
01051       return;
01052     
01053     size_t index = -1;
01054     size_t level = 0;
01055     size_t step = 0;
01056     
01057     for (typename StringT::const_iterator i = str.begin();
01058          i != str.end(); i++)
01059     {
01060       if (*i == beg) {
01061         index++;
01062         level++;
01063       }
01064       else if (*i == end) {
01065         if (level > 0) {
01066           level--;
01067           if (level == 0)
01068             step = 0;
01069           else
01070             step++;
01071         }
01072       }
01073       else if (level > 0) {
01074         CharT temp = *i;
01075         size_t finalIndex = index - step;
01076         while (finalIndex >=arrayOfstrings.size())
01077         {
01078           arrayOfstrings.push_back(StringT());
01079         }
01080         
01081         arrayOfstrings[finalIndex] += temp;
01082       }
01083       else;
01084     }
01085   }
01086 
01094   static void take_between_mark(const StringT& str, CharT mark,
01095                                   std::vector<StringT>& arrayOfstrings) 
01096   {
01097     arrayOfstrings.clear();
01098     
01099     size_t index = 0;
01100     size_t prev = 0;
01101 
01102     index = str.find(mark);
01103     prev = index;
01104 
01105     index = str.find(mark, index+1);
01106     while (index != (size_t)-1) {
01107       arrayOfstrings.push_back(cut_range(str, prev+1, index - 1));
01108       prev = index;
01109       index = str.find(mark, index+1);
01110     }
01111   }
01112 
01117   static StringT reverse_cut_rear_with(const StringT& str, CharT tag,
01118                                        bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
01119   {
01120     StringT s = str;
01121     reverse_cut_rear_with(s, tag, includeTag, caseChk);
01122     return s;
01123   }
01124 
01125   static void reverse_cut_rear_with(StringT& str, CharT tag,
01126                                        bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
01127   {
01128     size_t i;
01129     for (i = str.length()-1; i!=(size_t)-1; i--) {
01130       if (caseChk == SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==tag
01131           || caseChk == SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i],tag))
01132         break;
01133     }
01134 
01135     if (i!=(size_t)-1) {
01136       if (includeTag)
01137         cut_range(str, i, str.length()-1);
01138       else if (i < str.length()-1)
01139         cut_range(str, i+1, str.length()-1);
01140 
01141       return;
01142       
01143     }
01144 
01145     str.clear();
01146   }
01147 
01148   static StringT reverse_cut_front_with(const StringT& str, CharT tag,
01149                                        bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
01150   {
01151     StringT s = str;
01152     reverse_cut_front_with(s, tag, includeTag, caseChk);
01153     return s;
01154   }
01155 
01156   static void reverse_cut_front_with(StringT& str, CharT tag,
01157                                         bool includeTag = false, StrCompMode caseChk = SM_IGNORE) 
01158   {
01159     size_t i;
01160     for (i = str.length()-1; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
01161       if (caseChk == SM_SENSITIVE && str[i]==tag
01162           || caseChk == SM_IGNORE && IS_ALPHABET::equal_ignore_case(str[i],tag))
01163         break;
01164 
01165     if (i!=(size_t)-1) {
01166       if (includeTag)
01167         cut_range(str, 0, i);
01168       else if (i!=0)
01169         cut_range(str, 0, i-1);
01170       return;
01171     }
01172 
01173     str.clear();
01174   }

01188   static void compact_head(StringT& str)
01189   {
01190     size_t i=0;
01191     for (; i<str.length(); i++)
01192       if (!IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]))
01193         break;
01194 
01195     str = str.substr(i);
01196   }

01199   {

01201     compact_tail(s);
01202     return s;
01203   }
01204 
01205   static void compact_tail(StringT& str)
01206   {
01207     size_t i=str.length()-1;
01208     for (; i!=(size_t)-1; i--)
01209       if (!IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]))
01210         break;
01211 
01212     str = str.substr(0, i+1);
01213   }
01214 
01215   static StringT compact(const StringT& str)
01216   {
01217     StringT s;
01218     s = compact_head(str);
01219     compact_tail(s);
01220     return s;
01221   }

01224   {
01225     compact_head(str);
01226     compact_tail(str);
01227   }

01229   static StringT trim(const StringT& str)
01230   {
01231     StringT s;
01232     s.reserve(str.length()*3/4);
01233     
01234     size_t i=0;
01235     size_t last = i;
01236     for (; i<str.length(); i++)
01237     {
01238       if (!IS_ALPHABET::is_space(str[i]))
01239         continue;
01240       
01241       if (last<i )
01242       {
01243         s += str.substr(last, i-last);
01244       }
01245       
01246       last = i+1;
01247     }
01248     
01249     if (last < str.length())
01250       s += str.substr(last);
01251 
01252     return s;
01253   }
01254 
01255   static void trim(StringT& str)
01256   {
01257     const StringT s =str;
01258     str = trim(s);
01259   }

01261   static void read_from_file(const char* filename, std::vector<StringT>& lines, CharT line='\n')
01262   {
01263     std::ifstream file (filename, std::ios::in|std::ios::binary|std::ios::ate);
01264     // get length of file:
01265     file.seekg (0, std::ios::end);
01266     std::size_t length = file.tellg();
01267     file.seekg (0, std::ios::beg);
01268 
01269     // allocate memory:
01270     char* buffer = (char*)hlmalloc(length);
01271 
01272     // read data as a block:
01273     file.read (buffer,length);
01274     file.close();
01275 
01276     StringT s((CharT* )buffer, length/sizeof(CharT));
01277     hlfree(buffer);
01278     
01279     make_tokens_with_delimiter(s, line, lines);
01280   }
01281 
01282   static void write_to_file(const char* filename, const std::vector<StringT>& lines)
01283   {
01284     std::ofstream of(filename, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary);
01285 
01286     for (size_t i=0; i<lines.size(); i++)
01287     {
01288       for (typename StringT::const_iterator j = lines[i].begin(); j!=lines[i].end();j++)
01289       {
01290         CharT ch = *j;
01291         of.write((char*)&ch, sizeof(CharT));
01292       }
01293       CharT ch = '\n';
01294       of.write((char*)&ch, sizeof(CharT));
01295     }
01296 
01297     of.close();
01298   }

01328   static StringT generate_random_string(size_t size)
01329   {
01330     StringT s;
01331     s.reserve(size);
01332     CharT span = 'z'-'a';
01333 
01334     for (size_t i=0; i<size; i++)
01335       s += (CharT)(random()%span);
01336 
01337     return s;
01338   }

01340   static bool read_from_encode(const char* encode_type, const char* input, size_t len, StringT& output)
01341   {
01342     output.clear();
01343     
01344     iconv_t ic = iconv_open("ucs-2", encode_type);
01345     if (ic == (iconv_t)(-1))
01346       return false;
01347 
01348     size_t ilen = 0;
01349     size_t olen = 0;
01350     ilen = len;
01351     olen = ilen * 4;
01352     
01353     char *ibuf = const_cast<char *>(input);
01354     
01355     char *obuf_org = (char*)hlmalloc(olen);
01356     char *obuf = obuf_org;
01357     std::fill(obuf, obuf + olen, 0);
01358     
01359     size_t olen_org = olen;
01360     iconv(ic, 0, &ilen, 0, &olen);  // reset iconv state
01361     
01362     while (ilen != 0) {
01363       if (iconv(ic, &ibuf, &ilen, &obuf, &olen)
01364           == (size_t) -1) {
01365         //std::cout<<"oo"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01366         ibuf++;
01367         ilen++;
01368         //hlfree(obuf_org);
01369         //iconv_close(ic);
01370         //return false;
01371       }
01372       //std::cout<<"uu"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01373     }
01374 
01375     output.assign((CharT*)obuf_org, (olen_org - olen)/sizeof(CharT));
01376 
01377     hlfree(obuf_org);
01378     
01379     iconv_close(ic);
01380     
01381     return true;
01382   }
01383 
01384   static bool write_to_encode(const char* encode_type, char** output, size_t& len, const StringT& input)
01385   {
01386     iconv_t ic = iconv_open(encode_type, "ucs-2");
01387     
01388     if (ic == (iconv_t)(-1))
01389       return false;
01390     
01391     size_t ilen = 0;
01392     size_t olen = 0;
01393     ilen = input.size();
01394     olen = ilen * 4+1;
01395     char *ibuf = (char*)hlmalloc(ilen);
01396     char *ibuf_org = ibuf;
01397 
01398     input.copy((CharT*)ibuf, input.length());
01399 
01400     *output = (char*)hlmalloc(olen);
01401     char *obuf_org = *output;
01402     char *obuf = obuf_org;
01403     std::fill(obuf, obuf + olen, 0);
01404     
01405     size_t olen_org = olen;
01406     iconv(ic, 0, &ilen, 0, &olen);  // reset iconv state
01407     while (ilen != 0) {
01408       if (iconv(ic, &ibuf, &ilen, &obuf, &olen)
01409           == (size_t) -1) {
01410         //std::cout<<"jj"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01411         ibuf++;
01412         ilen++;
01413         //len =  olen_org - olen;
01414         //hlfree(ibuf_org);
01415         //iconv_close(ic);
01416 
01417         //return false;
01418       }
01419       //std::cout<<"yy"<<ilen<<std::endl;
01420     }
01421 
01422     len =  olen_org - olen;
01423     
01424     hlfree(ibuf_org);
01425     
01426     iconv_close(ic);
01427 
01428     return true;
01429   }

01431   static void release(char* p)
01432   {
01433     hlfree(p);
01434   }

01436   static void display(const StringT& str, const char* encode_t="UTF-8", std::ostream& os=std::cout)
01437   {
01438     char* buf=NULL;
01439     size_t len = 0;
01440 
01441     if (!write_to_encode(encode_t, &buf, len, str))      
01442       return;
01443     //buf[len-1] = '\0';
01444     
01445     os<<buf<<std::endl;
01446     release(buf);
01447   }

01450 }
